summary.title: Career Profile
summary.t1: Energetic software engineer. An enthusiastic team player and deep creative thinker.
summary.t2: Right now, I am working on my degree final project, focused on developing and working with TSP algorithms with the oficial TSPLib.

personalProfile.title: Personal Profile
personalProfile.p1: Team player software engineer with a can-do attitude, phenomenal time management skills, and a strong user focus.
personalProfile.p2: I have develop software in many languajes, especially in Java, C and Python. I have always had a keen interest in IT and pay great attention to detail work that I do.

details.p1: Compose an android app simulating the game Space Invaders then apply and try out different testing tools.
details.p2: Collaborating on developing a Telegram bot to automate multiple task.
details.p3: Working with Java + Spring framework for multiple projects. Building an RESTful API for an online GYM with this tecnology.
details.p11: Frontend and Backend development. Work with Spring Boot, AngularJS, Bootstrap, PostgreSQL, OracleSQL.
details.p13: General knowledge of RESTful APIs and JSON. Demonstrates good judgment and problem solving skills.

projectsCourses.competitive: Solve problems of online judge such as SPOJ or 'Acepta el reto' as hobby
